descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
"Welcome to ShootEmUp our Mixed Reality Shooter, an exhilarating gaming experience that brings the excitement of the battlefield right into your room. Dive into a world where your surroundings transform into dynamic landscapes, providing the backdrop for thrilling shooting challenges.

Embark on an epic journey through 50 challenging levels, each meticulously designed to push your shooting skills to the limit. Strategically plan your shots to knock down virtual bottles scattered throughout your environment, using logic and precision to overcome each obstacle.

But the adventure doesn't stop there! With regular updates, we're constantly adding new levels and features to keep the excitement fresh and the challenges coming. Stay tuned for even more thrilling content in future updates.

Immerse yourself in the immersive world of our Mixed Reality Shooter and experience the thrill of gaming like never before, right from the comfort of your own space."
